metadata.title: CVE-2013-4478 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Sup before 0.13.2.1 and 0.14.x before 0.14.1.1 allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in the filename of anemail attachment.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4478` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sup-mail - 0.22.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sup-mail package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.22.1-1').
